data.title: Body of Evidence DVD (1993)
data.meta_description: Shop the Best Collection of Classic Movies on DVD Like Body of Evidence DVD (1993) at Movie Buffs Forever. Browse Rare and Hard to Find Movies to Buy Online.
data.text:
When an elderly millionaire is found dead with cocaine in his system, his will leaves $8 million to Rebecca Carlson (Madonna), who was having an affair with him. District attorney Robert Garrett (Joe Mantegna) decides to prosecute Rebecca, arguing that she deliberately engaged in wild sex with the old man to overexcite him and lead to his premature death. Defense attorney Frank Dulaney (Willem Dafoe) defends Rebecca in court while getting sucked into a dangerous affair with her. Delivered sealed in case with artwork as shown on our website.

Starring: Madonna, William Defoe, Frank Langella, Joe Mantegna

Viewer Review: "This film is thought provoking. Can someone literally be, umm, sexed to death? Frank Langella is suitably creepy, and Joe Mantegna suitably industrious. I can,t lie-- I love it! I really do! Campy and fun!"

1h, 39m

Format: DVD

This DVD is encoded NTSC Region ALL (playable worldwide).

Usually ships in 1-3 days from the United States via USPS w/tracking.

Note: Christmas Shop Early To Avoid Severe Postal Shipping Delays.
